data.headline: Reign restored: Curry leads Warriors to fourth title in eight seasons

Behind Stephen Curry’s shooting and a bounce-back game from Draymond Green, the Warriors beat the Celtics 103-90 in Game 6 in Boston to close out the NBA Finals for their seventh title all-time, the third most in league history.
